channel.title: Please
channel.description:
I realllllllllllllllllllllllly freakin need someone to add me on skype or TV me and help me......
I'm tired of working on this bloody client.. It downloads some of the cache but not the rest.. and I can't find out the reason why... I get an error saying
[code] ------------------------------------------------ InsanityX (x64), Starting up... ------------------------------------------------ Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
96707947 : 0 Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Kayce\InsanityCacheV6\InsanityCacheV6.zi p?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:9479) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:9311) at client.startUp(client.java:9544) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:117) at client.run(client.java:6051) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 96707947 : 0 Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Kayce\InsanityCacheV6\InsanityCacheV6.zi p?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:9479) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:9404) at client.startUp(client.java:9544) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:117) at client.run(client.java:6051) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 96707947 : 0 Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Kayce\InsanityCacheV6\InsanityCacheV6.zi p?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:9479) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:9404) at client.startUp(client.java:9544) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:117) at client.run(client.java:6051) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 96707947 : 0 Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Kayce\InsanityCacheV6\InsanityCacheV6.zi p?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:9479) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:9404) at client.startUp(client.java:9544) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:117) at client.run(client.java:6051) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 96707947 : 0 Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Kayce\InsanityCacheV6\InsanityCacheV6.zi p?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:9479) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:9404) at client.startUp(client.java:9544) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:117) at client.run(client.java:6051) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Im asuming the error is in client.java? Around here?
[code]} catch (IOException ioexception) { if (s3.equals("Unknown error")) { s3 = "Connection error"; String url = "https://www.dropbox.com/s/99nmukjhfy8x50x/InsanityCacheV6.zip?dl=1"; downloadcache(url, "InsanityCacheV6.zip", "", "InsanityCacheV6"); } abyte0 = null; } catch (NullPointerException nullpointerexception) { s3 = "Null error"; abyte0 = null; if (!signlink.reporterror) { return null; }[/code]

item.title: Please
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You can download the file from dropbox, so you don’t need to host the file yourself, even with ?dl=1. (Just tested it)

Read full topic

item.title: Please
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Hyperon:

I believe you cannot use dropbox anymore because of the “?dl=1” part. You need to host it directly somewhere else. Try your VPS.

Not true afaik.

Mine works, and here is the line

However, it did start off as so:

Read full topic

item.title: Please
item.dc:creator: @divinationofgods divinationofgods
item.description:
@divinationofgods wrote:

Hyperon:

Place the cache.zip on your VPS desktop and swap “https://www.dropbox.com/s/99nmukjhfy8x50x/InsanityCacheV6.zip?dl=1” with “VPS.IP.HERE/cache.zip”.

the ipv4? I tried that and it didnt work

FIXED----------------FIXED

THANKS

Read full topic

item.title: Please
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

Place the cache.zip on your VPS desktop and swap “https://www.dropbox.com/s/99nmukjhfy8x50x/InsanityCacheV6.zip?dl=1” with “VPS.IP.HERE/cache.zip”.

Read full topic

item.title: Please
item.dc:creator: @divinationofgods divinationofgods
item.description:
@divinationofgods wrote:

Hyperon:

I believe you cannot use dropbox anymore because of the “?dl=1” part. You need to host it directly somewhere else. Try your VPS.

how would i set it up for download, this is one thing im not familiar with

Read full topic

item.title: Please
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

I believe you cannot use dropbox anymore because of the “?dl=1” part. You need to host it directly somewhere else. Try your VPS.

Read full topic
